mapper.sql: ${tableAlias}S_ID as "${columnPrefix}id", ${tableAlias}S_TEMPLATEID as "${columnPrefix}templateId", ${tableAlias}S_ROWID as "${columnPrefix}rowId", ${tableAlias}S_COLID as "${columnPrefix}colId", ${tableAlias}S_CONTENT as "${columnPrefix}content", ${tableAlias}S_ATTRIBUTECODE as "${columnPrefix}attributeCode", ${tableAlias}S_SUPPLIERCODE as "${columnPrefix}supplierCode", ${tableAlias}S_SUPPLIERNAME as "${columnPrefix}supplierName", ${tableAlias}C_SYNFLAG as "${columnPrefix}synFlag", ${tableAlias}D_SYNDATE as "${columnPrefix}synDate"
